trans-unit.source: . If you want to erase the calendar file, database, and Google OAuth permissions, just delete the contents of that directory.

trans-unit.source: . It’s up to you to develop rules for tracking what you want to, but the suggested system you use is one of hashtags (like on Twitter) to keep your records machine searchable but still quite human readable.
trans-unit.target: 。您可以自行制定规则来跟踪所需的内容，但是建议使用的系统是标签之一（例如在Twitter上），以使记录机器可搜索，但仍易于阅读。

trans-unit.source: And then when that succeeds, a link to the event on the Google Calendar web interface. Congratulations, you can now create events on Google Calendar from your terminal!
trans-unit.target: 当成功创建后,在Google日历的网页界面上就会出现一个事件的链接。恭喜你,现在你可以在Google日历上通过终端创建事件了。

trans-unit.source: I also use a few extra scripts to manage adding events to my lifelogger via some shortcuts. Check out the ‘scripts’ folder for copies of these. You’ll need to customize them to your purpose as they are exporting my events only as it stands.
trans-unit.target: 我还使用一些额外的脚本通过一些快捷方式来管理向事件记录器添加事件。查看“脚本”文件夹以获取这些副本。您需要根据目的自定义它们，因为它们仅按原样导出我的事件。

trans-unit.source: Imagine you’ve got your scales out, and you weigh yourself - let’s record it on the calendar as a 0-minute event:
trans-unit.target: 假设您已经放磅秤了，然后自己称体重-让我们将其记录在日历中，作为一个0分钟的事件：

trans-unit.source: Install with pip, the python package manager:
trans-unit.target: 用python包管理器pip安装。

trans-unit.source: Installation Instructions
trans-unit.target: 安装说明

trans-unit.source: Let’s run a quick search on all of our
trans-unit.target: 让我们快速搜索所有

trans-unit.source: Lifelogger has now fetched your entire Google Calendar history locally and then converted into a database which can be used to query it quickly. It’s good to do this regularly, so you have a backup of your data, as well as being able to analyze all of it (the analysis commands only run on the local database copy of your data, not against the Google Calendar API).
trans-unit.target: 现在，Lifelogger已在本地获取了整个Google日历历史记录，然后转换为可用于快速查询的数据库。定期执行此操作非常好，这样您就可以备份数据，并能够分析所有数据（分析命令仅在数据的本地数据库副本上运行，而不针对Google Calendar API运行）。

trans-unit.source: Now let’s download the calendar for analysis. Run:
trans-unit.target: 现在，让我们下载日历进行分析。跑：

trans-unit.source: Once you get going, you’ll probably want to track things quickly, so you can save some type from writing the long word
trans-unit.target: 一旦开始，您可能想要快速跟踪事物，因此您可以省去写长词的类型

trans-unit.source: Quickstart Guide
trans-unit.target: 快速入门指南

trans-unit.source: Run for the first time, which should initialize the OAuth connection dialog.
trans-unit.target: 第一次运行,应该会初始化OAuth连接对话框。

trans-unit.source: The event should be added straightforwardly.
trans-unit.target: 活动应该直接添加。

trans-unit.source: Track your life like a pro on Google Calendar via your terminal.
trans-unit.target: 通过终端在谷歌日历上像专业人士一样追踪你的生活。

trans-unit.source: You should see a listing of all your events that match ‘#weight’, with their date/time and the full information. There are plenty more commands to play with, including other options and ways to add events to your calendar, as well as query them in more interesting ways. Have a poke around in the source code to check it out!
trans-unit.target: 您应该会看到所有与“ #weight”匹配的事件的列表，包括它们的日期/时间和完整信息。还有更多命令可以使用，包括其他选项和向日历添加事件以及以更有趣的方式查询事件的方法。在源代码中戳一下以查看它！

trans-unit.source: is also aware of common data formats and knows how to search them, so we can just enter our weight in kg
trans-unit.target: 也知道常见的数据格式,也知道如何搜索,所以我们只需输入我们的体重(公斤)即可。

trans-unit.source: l

trans-unit.source: lifelogger
trans-unit.target: 生命记录器

trans-unit.source: stores events directly into Google Calendar via its API. It can also download your entire calendar back to your computer via the “iCal export” URL that Google provides, and then you can use commands to analyze it locally. Downloading the entire calendar back makes it a lot faster to perform any analysis:
trans-unit.target: 通过其API将事件直接存储到Google日历中。它还可以通过Google提供的“ iCal导出” URL将整个日历下载回计算机，然后您可以使用命令在本地对其进行分析。重新下载整个日历可以更快地执行任何分析：

trans-unit.source: the private URL for your calendar (unfortunately there is no way to do this with the API). So follow the instructions, heading to the Google Calendar web interface and copying the URL from there. Once you’ve set that, the download should progress (can take a few seconds):
trans-unit.target: 您日历的专用网址（不幸的是，无法通过API进行此操作）。因此，请按照说明进行操作，转到Google日历网络界面，然后从那里复制URL。设置好之后，下载将继续进行（可能需要几秒钟）：
